page.title: 13RECREATION (LAMPHEY)
page.content: Although the area is relatively sparsely populared there are a number of recreational facilities available in Lamphey.There are very good playing fields with a new sports pavilion.These facilities are used by two cricket teams,one soccer team and one hockey team.There are private squash courts in one of the public houses. The beaches provide excellent facilities for swimming ,surfing and fishing and there are numerous walks in the area. More extensive sports facilities are available at the sports centre in Pembroke.
